thread.title: Border militia participant convicted of federal gun charge
thread.title_full: Border militia participant convicted of federal gun charge - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Border militia participant convicted of federal gun charge
text: BROWNSVILLE, Texas (AP) - A federal judge has convicted a member of a border militia of federal firearms crimes after guns and thousands of rounds of ammunition were found in his motel room after a friendly fire incident involving a Border Patrol agent. Kevin Lyndel Massey was found guilty Wednesday ... ...
